title: strengthening-community
tag-3: Citi's mission is to enable growth and economic progress.
tag-4: Execute a business model that drives positive social impact
tag-5: Partner with community organizations, foster open dialogue with key stakeholders and develop enduring solutions
tag-6: Build an inclusive workplace that harnesses the expertise and passion of our people to make a positive impact
tag-7: Take a stand on issues that matter, helping to shape and inform solutions to systemic problems that affect our communities
tag-8: Citi’s financial education module helps provide LGBTQ+ individuals with the fundamentals on managing money.
